summary: This document is a series of suicide watch observation logs for inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated July 23-24, 2019. It includes chronological logs and observation entries documenting his status and behavior in the hours leading up to his removal from suicide watch on July 24, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the suicide watch logs, identified by name and register number. The logs track his observations leading up to his removal from suicide watch on July 24, 2019.

events.title: Epstein placed on suicide watch
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was placed on suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

events.title: Suicide watch observations
events.description: Detailed 5-minute interval observations of inmate Jeffrey Epstein were logged throughout the day and night.

events.title: Epstein removed from suicide watch
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was taken off suicide watch at 08:45 hours.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (MCC New York)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was on an active suicide watch from at least July 6, 2019, until July 24, 2019.
He was removed from suicide watch at 08:45 on July 24, 2019.
The logs show structured 5-minute observations of his behavior and status, though many handwritten entries are difficult to decipher.
The document is part of the official Bureau of Prisons record-keeping system (SENTRY).
The logs were created in the immediate days before Epstein's death in August 2019.
